data.title: This will get your ears and boogie going!
data.meta_description: Does anyone remember the 1970's? Going through a box of old CDs (remember those) and found one from the “Have A Nice Day” series. I completely forgot about this set(s).
data.text:
Does anyone remember the 1970's?

Going through a box of old CDs (remember those) and found one from the “Have A Nice Day” series.

I completely forgot about this set(s).

I had a box set once but left it somewhere.

The box set was called Have A Nice Decade: The '70s Pop Culture Box.

I bought it early because I thought it kind of cool that the box used for first pressing was actually a REAL shag carpet!

The smile thing is the image (you HAVE to remember this.)

THIS will bring back some memories. Some good. Some not so good?

TRACKS:
